Vacancy-Seeker Mismatch in Japan Chapter 1 Summary

Vacancy-Seeker Mismatch in Japan Keisuke Kawata 2021-05-01 Chapter 1 Summary This page reports the mismatch index (Åžahin et al. 2014) in Japanese job-search market. We use the Referentials and Placements by Prefecture, Employment Referral Statistics, which reports monthly numbers of vacancy, job seekers, and new employment.
